body:
I will be posting out videos of nebula gameplay, starting with this video!
1st video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CLC45rypHQw&list=UU8egN_x6xBygANosaUt6OYw
Nebula Gameplay will not be my only videos, im also planning for animations and maps, also other gameplay of other minigames
VampireZ: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DG02mviwxIY&list=UU8egN_x6xBygANosaUt6OYw&index=2
Like and sub!

title: Youtube Videos of Nebula Gameplay!

replies.body:
Nice video! However, the 'Media' section is only for Avicus-related content, so I suggest you do not post videos of other minigames. You're free to leave them on your channel, though.

If you feel comfortable about your speaking voice (and if you have a mic) it'd be cool if you would make a commentary! :D
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Nice video!

Recommendations: 
  • Editing software
  • Music (Nocopyrightsounds)
  • Commentary
Dats pretty much it! Keep it up ^.^
